titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the University at Buffalo Music Library Collection of Concert Programs, circa 1877-2009
University at Buffalo Music Library Collection of Concert Programs
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by John Bewley.

publicationstmt.publisher: State University of New York at Buffalo. Music Library

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in EAD by John Bewley, December 2018.

did.head: Collection Overview
did.unittitle: University at Buffalo Music Library Collection of Concert Programs, circa 1877-2009

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: State University of New York at Buffalo. Music Library

did.langmaterial: Collection materials in English, French, German, and Swedish.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: State University of New York at Buffalo. Music Library

did.abstract: The collection contains 13 boxes of concert programs, chiefly from England, but also including Buffalo, New York, and other cities in the United states, Austria, German, and other European countries, as well as Mexico and Canada.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Specified item], University at Buffalo Music Library Collection of Concert Programs, circa 1877-2009, Music Library, The State University of New York at Buffalo.

accessrestrict.head: Terms of Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials can be examined by qualified researchers in the Music Library during hours of operation during which Music Librarians are present. In order to insure access, researchers are advised to contact the Music Library in advance of visits.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright for the materials in the collection does not reside with the Music Library. Therefore, patrons wishing to publish any item, or part of an item from this collection for any purpose, are responsible for securing requisite permissions.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Music Library through purchase and solicitation.

accruals.head: Accruals and Additions
accruals.p: No further accruals are expected to this collection.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The collection was compiled from a combination of sources, including purchases from vendors and gifts from donors. Many of the programs are fairly rare, especially those from the 19th century.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains 13 boxes of concert programs, chiefly from England, but also including Buffalo, New York, and other cities in the United states, Austria, German, and other European countries, as well as Mexico and Canada.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection has been roughly sorted by geographic location of the performance.

did.unittitle: England. London. Queen's Hall and Wigmore Hall, 1895-1956
England. London. Royal Philharmonic and London Philharmonic Societies, 1877-1961
Germany. Varied locations, unsorted programs, undated
Other European countries, Mexico, Canada, and Jerusalem, undated

scopecontent.p: European countries include Belgium, France, Monaco, Netherlands, Sweden, and Switzerland.

did.unittitle:
United States. New York. Buffalo, Lewiston, and Rochester,
undated
United States. New York. New York and Boston, Massachusetts, undated

Tour program booklets without specific performance venues,
undated
